name: Elasticsearch
description: Open source real time server for search and data analysis
summary: Elasticsearch is a search server based on Lucene. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with a RESTful web interface and schema-free JSON documents. Elasticsearch is developed in Java and is released as open source under the terms of the Apache License. Elasticsearch is the second most popular enterprise search engine
scenario: When you have to build advanced search features into a big website
When you have to provide full text search in a big cluster of documents
When you want to track analytics in real time

similar.relationship: It does not support nested object structure
